Description.Text:
Property Location
Royal Court Hotel is in the heart of Rome, walking distance from National Central Library of Rome and Diocletian Bath. This 4-star hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 24 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Royal Court Hotel is in the heart of Rome, walking distance from National Central Library of Rome and Diocletian Bath. This 4-star hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

National Central Library of Rome - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Diocletian Bath - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Umberto I Policlinic of Rome - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Porta Pia - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Santa Maria degli Angeli - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
University of Roma-La Sapienza - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Teatro Ambra Jovinelli - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Piazza Vittorio Emanuele II - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.6 km / 8.4 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 24.2 km / 15.1 mi

The preferred airport for Royal Court Hotel is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
